description: Numbers n such that continued fraction for sqrt(n) has odd period and a pair of central terms both equal to 7.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: n = 1; t = {}; While[Length[t] < 50, n++; If[! IntegerQ[Sqrt[n]], c = ContinuedFraction[Sqrt[n]]; len = Length[c[[2]]]; If[OddQ[len] && c[[2, (len + 1)/2]] == 7, AppendTo[t, n]]]]; t (* _T. D. Noe_, Apr 04 2014 *)
author: _David W. Wilson_
extensions: Initial erroneous term 50 removed by _T. D. Noe_, Apr 04 2014
